title: MySQLCURRENT_TIME()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLCURRENT_TIME()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return current time:
SELECT CURRENT_TIME();

Definition and Usage
The CURRENT_TIME() function returns the current time.
Note:
The time is returned as 
"HH-MM-SS" (string) or as HHMMSS.uuuuuu (numeric).
Note:
This function equals the
CURTIME()
function.
Syntax
CURRENT_TIME()
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0
More Examples
Example
Return current time + 1:
SELECT CURRENT_TIME() + 1;

★
+1

quiz.question: What is The time?
quiz.explanation:
The correct definition of The time is 'returned as 
"HH-MM-SS" (string) or as HHMMSS'.
